Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: MIDDLE KINGDOM (not after); 2ND INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not before)
Name: Jar
Description: Tapered, oval-shaped jar with a rounded base. The short neck widens upwards towards a fat beaded lip with an uneven rim. There is an incised mark on the interior surface of the collar.
